TopicTitle: How do I uninstall and re-install KSP on Steam?

Articles.Content:
I backed up my saves, and deleted by "Delete game content". Then re installed.

The first booting up KSP crashed, then when I opened, all my mods, saves and screnshots were still there!

Edited November 11, 2015 by Thegamer211
Steam will leave behind files that it doesn't think that it installed. You can use the "Delete game content" followed by manually deleting the file in Steam Apps.
